subtitleNullable: 5-Year stock price data on 5 companies and 1 ETF
descriptionNullable:
# Introduction
Hello fellow Kagglers, this dataset is for the ones interesting in the stock market, more particularly in the Financial Technology space. The dataset is broken down into two folders: ETFS and EQUITY. There are 10 ETFs and 22 Individual stocks each provided with a 5-year historical data CSV file and a Markdown file reporting the company information. 

# Tasks
There is plenty of room to dive into some time series forecasting, portfolio analysis/simulation or even algorithmic trading. Feel free to explore all those different uses and beyond. It is my hope it'll serve you in your data science and financial analysis journey. Happy Coding!

# Frequency
We datasets will be updated on a bi-weekly basis.

There are 10 ETFs and 22 Individual stocks each provided with a 5-year historical data CSV file and a Markdown file reporting the company information.
